Perceptor::

"Decepticons don't need weak leaders, if MEgatron couldn't keep 
Decepticons' leadership then he didn't decerve it... I'm with you" 
answered Perceptor



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Switchblade --
> 
> Autoguns and missile pods arm themselves and aim themselves at 
> Preceptor.
> 
> Switchblade smiles, "Preceptor, welcome to the Dark Avian. Megatron 
> is... dead." His smile widdens with his words. Lackies didn't need 
> to know anymore than he wanted them too. Calmly, he speaks 
> again, "Perceptor. As you can see you are in a tricky situation. 
Now 
> is a time when a simple direct answer is most profitable, for both 
> of us. Are you with me, or against me?" Switchblade sits back, 
> singed bodies of Firestrike's rampage litter the ground around him.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > Perceptor:
> > 
> > Perceptor arrived to Decepticon's base and open comm link in all

> new
